page.title: 14Customs. Helford Area.
page.content: HARVEST FESTIVALS _ Services and suppers are popular in the churches, also in public houses. Manaccan H.F. coincides with feast day. GOOD FRIDAY_ Custom of cockle picking _ locally known as trigging. ST MARTIN Horticultural and handicraft Show is held at Sworne Farm. HELFORD Village and Helford River Sailing Club have Regattas in the summer. MANACCAN _ School children and parents join in pancake race on Shrove Tuesday. The schools hold annual sports days. Also end of term services in church. Methodist Sunday Schools have anniversary services, prize giving and outings. There is some trick or treat activity on Halloween. Shooting on Boxing Day is customary. Carols are sung through the area at Christmas.
